data.title: Currency NIO Nicaragua [Nicaraguan córdoba]
data.text:
Other currency selection:

Currency

Currency details NIO Nicaragua [Nicaraguan córdoba]

Label of currency NIO is Nicaraguan córdoba.

Currency code NIO is associated to Nicaragua, flag is used on this site for it.

Amounts in this currency have up to 2 decimals.

It is mainly associated to country or zone Nicaragua.

Currency code NIO is a 3 letter normalized code according to standard ISO-4217, the 2 first letters are the code of the issuing country, third letter is the initial of the currency.

We recorded price on this currency since 1988-01-01

List of countries that are using or were using currency NIO :
